text: This section describes the Firebase agent. The agent is a forwarding agent available in real-time workflow configurations. The Firebase agent allows push notifications to be sent to mobile devices using Firebase Cloud Messaging. Open Example workflow with a Firebase agent There are two UDR types specific to the APN agent; FirebaseUDR and FirebaseErrorUDR . Prerequisites The user of this information should be familiar with: Firebase Cloud Messaging The section contains the following subsections: Firebase UDRs Firebase Agent Configuration Firebase Agent Meta Information Model and Events
title: Firebase Agent - MediationZone Documentation 9.4 - InfoZone
